short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate Google review link and QR Code, then share the review URL and QR Code with your customers to grow your Google reviews.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One-click to generate the Google review link from Google Maps, where customers can write reviews.

Google reviews are a great way to show potential customers that you’re a trusted business. 

✅ Generate a Google Review link, then share the link on social media like Twitter, Facebook etc.
✅ Generate a Google Review QR Code and print it on your menus, posters, checkout counters, receipts and other marketing materials, with a scannable QR code, customers can use their smartphone cameras to quickly look up your Google My Business page and submit photos and reviews of their experience.
